text: Nudist Memories is a 1959 British naturist film. It was inspired by the success of Nudist Paradise and was a success at the box office.Simon Sheridan, Keeping the British End Up: Four Decades of Saucy Cinema, Titan Books 2011 p 38-39 ==References== ==External links== *Nudist Memories at IMDb Category:British films
title: Nudist Memories
